item.title: Report E-2024120053
item.description:
Report E-2024120053

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-06T12:24:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-04
  • City: GLENPOOL
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 6000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal LTU experienced a UN1814 Mar-Tek 911 release from a 330-gallon poly tote. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 1-cup of product released to a 1’ x 1’ area of the poly tote lid due to a cracked tote. The material was transferred from the damaged tote into a new one. The damaged tote was cut up and containerized along with impacted pads from cleanup into (2) 55-gallon poly drums. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage
